devdoc.details: The Deployer Whitelist is a temporary predeploy used to provide additional safety during the initial phases of our mainnet roll out. It is owned by the Optimism team, and defines accounts which are allowed to deploy contracts on Layer2. The Execution Manager will only allow an ovmCREATE or ovmCREATE2 operation to proceed if the deployer's address whitelisted.

returns._0: _allowed Whether or not the address can deploy contracts.

params._isWhitelisted: Whether or not the address is whitelisted.

devdoc.title: OVM_DeployerWhitelist

enableArbitraryContractDeployment().notice: Permanently enables arbitrary contract deployment and deletes the owner.

isDeployerAllowed(address).notice: Checks whether an address is allowed to deploy contracts.

setOwner(address).notice: Updates the owner of this contract.

setWhitelistedDeployer(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes an address from the deployment whitelist.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Function can only be called by the owner of this contract."

arguments.value: Function can only be called by the owner of this contract.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Function can only be called by the owner of this contract."

documentation.text: Blocks functions to anyone except the contract owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "OVM_DeployerWhitelist: can only be disabled via enableArbitraryContractDeployment"

arguments.value: OVM_DeployerWhitelist: can only be disabled via enableArbitraryContractDeployment

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "OVM_DeployerWhitelist: can only be disabled via enableArbitraryContractDeployment"

documentation.text:
Updates the owner of this contract.
 @param _owner Address of the new owner.
Permanently enables arbitrary contract deployment and deletes the owner.
